events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving rear-end collision while stopped at a signal.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident as per the customer's submission of vehicle details and incident type.
An agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim to ensure timely support and communication.
Acknowledgment message sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Request sent to the customer for accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration papers to proceed with claim investigation.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and official accident report.
Investigation team began examining the claim details, verifying submitted documents and assessing damage estimates.
Investigation concluded confirming accident circumstances and damage extent matching customer’s reported information.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the damage evaluation and policy coverage limits for the auto accident claim.
Customer provided positive feedback appreciating the efficient handling and clear communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement offer and verification of all conditions.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer’s bank account as per the approved settlement amount for the vehicle repair.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after payment issuance and confirmation that customer’s vehicle was repaired.
The claim file was archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference following closure procedures.
